item.description:
John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band at South County Balloon Festival
Friday, July 20, 2012
6:00 PM
http://www.southcountyballoonfest.com/?/events/view/balloon_glow
$10 admission for balloon festival.
http://www.southcountyballoonfest.com/events

URI Athletic Fields
off Rte. 138
3 Keaney Road
Kingston, RI 02881
Join us to see the great local band of John Cafferty and Beaver Brown from 6:30 to 8:30pm. Then we can watch the balloons as they slowly rise and glow against the evening sky. Bring your cameras for this popular event. Try to arrive early .
Look for my rainbow umbrella – I hope to have a spot in front of the music under the tent.
2012 South County Balloon Festival Schedule (Tentative)
Friday, July 20
All Weekend Events Include - Kids Train Ride and Trout Fishing Pond (Both Free w/ Admission)
Carnival Rides and Games, Crafts Show, Food Court, Inflatable Rides, Pony Rides, and Petting Zoo
4:00pm – 7:00pm Providence Bruins Hockey ‘Street Team”
4:00pm Ticket Booth Opens
4:30pm – 5:00pm Bwana Jim’s Wild Animal Show - Free w/ Admission
4:30pm – 6:00pm Tropical Wave Music w/ Dennis Jansson - Free w/ Admission
5:30pm – 6:00pm Bwana Jim’s Wild Animal Show - Free w/ Admission
6:00pm – 6:30pm Cannon Lady - Free w/ Admission
6:30pm – 8:30pm John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band - RAIN OR SHINE - Free w/ admission
7:00pm – 9:00pm Hot Air Balloon Glow @ Dusk
7:00pm Hot Air Balloons Fly and Tethered Balloon Rides Begin (Weather Permitting)
item.name: music and hot air balloons!
